content.raw:
I decided to go back to basics and not invert the image and then just do the most basic of transforms, just camera to head.  With that, my answers agree with the head frame (not head frame flipped) result in scoring.
So we're good for now.   I'm going to mark issue #25 resolved.
[Louise](https://bitbucket.org/chapulina/), thanks for the excellent work.
